case.title: Live In Opportunity - 24 (Upper West Side)
case.text:
Great opportunity for someone looking for housing and is new to NYC. I have a fully furnished room available in a condo with doorman , in exchange for light house keeping-cleaning;laundry; light cooking;organizing,not needed everyday. . Ideal for student Are you interested in a furnished room in exchange for light house keeping in Manhattan?My condo is located off the A/D/C train in nice/safe neighborhood. Room has WiFi internet and queen size bed,dresser w/ mirror.Completely furnished I am available to show the room today. if things are right,you can move in this week.No experience is required....please tell me a little about yourself. International students are welcomed...Free after 1 pm to interview potential candidates someone trying to make it in NYC.If you are interested,respond with some info about yourself. I am available to meet anytime after 9am....Some duties include: 1 Light cleaning2.laundry 3.Mopping.4. Organizing
Live out position-$20 hourly Paid same day
